attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The premise for the current property tax system is out of date and unfair.

The property tax system should be REFORMED AND REPLACED WITH A LOCAL CITIZEN TAX(this is the action I am requesting) to pay for all the services that every citizen utilizes such as police and fire services, waste pick up, street lighting, roald repairs, schools, etc.
It should be based on the cost of providing these services and charged to each citizen/household appropriately. Increases in this charge should only occur if new services are introduced or because of inflation. As a part of this reform much greater responsibility for the administration of this tax should be given back to local authorities.

rejection.details: The title should be a call for action and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
